mean_cn: v.提供，给予；使成为，致使，使处于（某种状态）；（以某种方式）表达，表现；粉刷，往（墙上）抹灰；  n.粉刷，打底，交纳
mean_en: to cause somebody/something to be in a particular state or condition
sentence: The kind teacher rendered a lot of financial assistance to her poor students.
sentence_trans: 善良的老师为贫困生提供了很多经济援助。
word_etyma: rend给 + er表动词 → 给 → render使成为，给予
